layer.added_origins.xtraterestrial.name: Xtraterestrial Species
layer.added_origins.dakorspecies.name: Dakor Species
origin.added_origins.xtraterestrial.name: Xtraterestrial
origin.added_origins.xtraterestrial.desc: The Xtraterestrial is a multi-species centered around Warmth or Cold. One of them excels in the nether with great fire abilties, while the other excels in the cold
origin.added_origins.dakorspecies.name: Dakor
origin.added_origins.dakorspecies.descri: The Dakor is a multi-species centered around darkness and shadows. They are the natural enemies of the Lakor, along with being mostly self-centered and stong.
origin.added_origins.advanced_rat.name: Rat
origin.added_origins.advanced_rat.descri: The rat is a great cook!
origin.added_origins.buried.name: Buried
origin.added_origins.buried.description: The Buried is a creature that was once punished to be buried alive. After many decades, it came back to seek revenge.
origin.added_origins.cacti.name: Cacti
origin.added_origins.pumpkineer.name: Pumpkineer
origin.added_origins.pumpkineer.descript: The Pumpkineer is said to be a failed attempt at creating a new kind of golem. Instead, it now feeds off of the souls it was meant to protect.
origin.added_origins.dakor_species/dakor: The Dakor Healer specializes in self healing and life stealing
origin.added_origins.dakorm.name: Dakor Water Mage
origin.added_origins.dakorm.description: The Dakor Water Mage is an expert in submariner combat.
origin.added_origins.dakorw.name: Dakor Warrior
origin.added_origins.dakorw.description: The Dakor Warrior is capable of channeling Rage Magic, which enhances their combat capabilities for a short period of time.
origin.added_origins.cactusorigin.name: Cacti+
origin.added_origins.illusionist.name: Illusionist
origin.added_origins.illusionist.descrip: The Illusionist is proficient with Illusion Magic, and is capable of confusing their enemies quite easily.
origin.added_origins.antimancer.name: Antimancer
origin.added_origins.antimancer.descript: The Antimancer is a mob-slaying expert.
origin.added_origins.lakor.name: Lakor Healer
origin.added_origins.lakor.description: These Lakor specialize in radial Healing Magic.
origin.added_origins.lakorw.name: Lakor Warrior
origin.added_origins.lakorw.description: The Lakor Warrior is skilled in combat, and has years of intensive training experience.
origin.added_origins.caverner.name: Caverner
origin.added_origins.caverner.descriptio: This human-like origin can mine blocks from farther away with their hands. They are the ultimate cave expert
origin.added_origins.jumpscar.name: Jumpscare
origin.added_origins.jumpscar.descriptio: Jumpscare is simply a colloquial name for a creature that has yet to be accurately identified. It has strong eyes and enjoys blinding others.
origin.added_origins.cowsian.name: Cowsian
origin.added_origins.endermite.name: Endermite
origin.added_origins.endermite.descripti: The endermite is usually spawned from the usage of an ender pearl, but have now been seen spawning naturally.
origin.added_origins.giant.name: Giant
origin.added_origins.giant.description: A creature of immense size and power.
origin.added_origins.megalodon.name: Megalodon
origin.added_origins.megalodon.descripti: These creatures often dwell in the deepest parts of the ocean, and were thought to be extinct.
origin.added_origins.roachist.name: Roachist
origin.added_origins.necromancer.name: Necromancer
origin.added_origins.necromancer.descrip: The Necromancer summons entities of the dead to fight for them.
origin.added_origins.silverfishian.name: Silverfishian
origin.added_origins.silverfishian.descr: The Silverfish typically dwell in dungeons, but can sometimes be found living in other kinds of ruins.
origin.added_origins.silverfishiash.name: Silverfishiash
origin.added_origins.silverfishiash.desc: The Silverfishiash are an evolved species of Silverfish.
origin.added_origins.xtraterestrial_spec: This mythical creature has lived in cold and icy places for thousands of years. A cold presence always follows
These creatures have just recently discovered the surface. For the past thousands of years, they have been dwelling underground.
power.added_origins.anormalsizeshift.des: Switch to the size of a regular human.
power.added_origins.betterfoodfull.name: Better Taste
You are bigger than the average human.
power.added_origins.megalodon/megalospee: You are extremely fast when underwater.
power.added_origins.burypunch.name: Bury Punch
power.added_origins.burypunch.descriptio: You bury things in the ground 4 blocks deep when you hit them.
power.added_origins.cowsian/cowlife.name: Neutral Peace
power.added_origins.cowsian/cowlife.desc: Mobs that use Sight to see you will not come after you, even if you hit them. Some mobs are immune to this
power.added_origins.cowsian/keepfullinve: When you Resurrect, you will keep all items except for anything considered meat.
power.added_origins.cowsian/truepeace.de: Your passiveness grants you immense healing capabilities
power.added_origins.cowsian/bovine_frien: You are physically unable to harm cows.
power.added_origins.dakormage.name: Resistant
power.added_origins.dividefalldamage.des: You take half as much fall damage as you used to!
power.added_origins.megalodon/drinkwater: Drinking from any type of potion restores air while on land.
power.added_origins.fireshootm.name: Trident Magic
power.added_origins.fireshootm.descripti: You can launch tridents using you Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.foodgiver.name: Food Boost
power.added_origins.foodgiver.descriptio: Food becomes more satiating for a period of time when pressing the Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.friendsofpillages.de: You are part of the Illagers, thus Illager types do not attack you.
power.added_origins.giantsizeshift.name: Giant Size Shift
power.added_origins.giantsizeshift.descr: You can become the size of a giant!
power.added_origins.healerabil.name: Healing Radius
power.added_origins.healerabil.descripti: You can heal yourself and other creatures around you by pressing your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.hugeapetite.name: Huge Appetite
power.added_origins.hugeapetite.descript: You eat more than others by a considerable amount.
power.added_origins.xestrial/icysubstanc: Your powers increase while within a cold biome
power.added_origins.illusionerarmy.name: Illusioner Minions
power.added_origins.illusionerarmy.descr: You can summon an army of Illusioners using your Secondary Ability key.
Your skin is extremely fragile to cold environments
power.added_origins.jumpscar/jumpscare.d: You can dash and inflict blindness at a radius around you using your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.jumpscar/eversight.d: Your eyes are extremely well developed. Your eyes are resistant to all types of blindness while also having good vision in the dark.
added_origins.jes_eversight: §d§l> Eversight: §r§dYou become immune to all forms of blindness (darkness/blindness)
added_origins.jes_nightvision: §1§l> Night Vision: §r§1You have constant night vision all of the time
power.added_origins.jumpscar/netherpunch: You can bring forth lightning to everything in a 15 block radius while sickening them.
power.added_origins.jumpscar/nosleepjump: You can never sleep, you are forever stuck awake
You can never sleep... no matter what.
power.added_origins.lakordamagebuff.name: Lakor Warrior
power.added_origins.lakordamagebuff.desc: As a warrior you are naturally better at combat.
power.added_origins.lakorkillerradius.de: You can summon a Killing Radius cloud by pressing your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.xestrial/lavahaterxe: Having a chance to escape fire was fine. Now it kills you instantly.
power.added_origins.less_hunger.name: Small Appetite
power.added_origins.levitationillusion.d: You can fly for 5 seconds by pressing your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.lightningsummon.name: Lightning Ring
power.added_origins.lightningsummon.desc: You can summon lightning in all four directions around you.
power.added_origins.modifyhealth.name: Additional Health
power.added_origins.necrofalldd.name: Diseased
power.added_origins.necrofalldd.descript: You take additional damage from everything else.
power.added_origins.necrofiredd.name: Diseased
power.added_origins.necrofiredd.descript: You take additional damage from everything else.
power.added_origins.necrolava.name: Diseased
power.added_origins.necrolava.descriptio: You take additional damage from everything else.
power.added_origins.necromancerarrowi.de: You are immune to arrow damage.
power.added_origins.necromancerdd.name: Diseased
power.added_origins.necromancerdd.descri: You take additional damage from everything else.
power.added_origins.necromancermobi.name: Mob Mentality
power.added_origins.necromancermobi.desc: You no longer receive damage from mobs.
power.added_origins.necromancersummons.d: You can summon a buffed skeleton to fight for you.
You can summon a buffed zombie to fight for you.
power.added_origins.necroonfiredd.name: Diseased
power.added_origins.necroonfiredd.descri: You take additional damage from everything else.
power.added_origins.caverner/stone_climb: You can climb on all natural stone blocks
power.added_origins.caverner/silkhands.d: Your hands are able harvest items just as a stone pickaxe would.
power.added_origins.caverner/efficientar: You can mine all blocks at a faster rate, but you can mine all stone types even faster.
power.added_origins.nohitdamage.name: Weak Fists
power.added_origins.nohitdamage.descript: You are unable to damage anything without the use of a sword.
power.added_origins.pumpkineer/noregengo: You cannot naturally regenerate health anymore, instead, you are bound to take the life from souls.
power.added_origins.pumpkineer/nosleeppu: You are unable to sleep since the souls have not been harvested...
You cannot sleep, You have harvesting to do...
You take less damage from mobs.
power.added_origins.pumpkineer/blindness: You blind anything that you hit temporarily.
power.added_origins.dakor_healer/weakhea: You aren't that skilled at healing others, but you still try.
power.added_origins.dakor_healer/selfreg: You are great at healing yourself frequently.
power.added_origins.dakor_healer/soulsna: When hitting someone, you can take their life for your own benefit
added_origins.dhss_applyregen: §c§l> Regeneration Application: §r§cApplies Regeneration I to yourself when hitting something
added_origins.dhss_applywither: §8§l> Wither Application: §r§8Applies Wither II to your target
power.added_origins.dakor_healer/blessed: All healing effects on you are tripled no matter what
power.added_origins.zythl/not_so_fine.de: Water immediately poisons you whenever you come in contact with it
power.added_origins.zythl/lavakiller.des: You do extra damage while within 2 blocks of lava
power.added_origins.zythl/lavaviewer.des: You're eyes are extremely efficient when submerged in lava.
power.added_origins.zythl/lavaswimming.d: You are able to swim when submerged in lava
added_origins.zls_badgelavaswim: §4§l> Lava swimming: §r§4You can swim in lava just like you could in water
added_origins.zls_badgelavamovement: §4§l> Accelerated Movement: §r§4When within 2 blocks of lava, you become 2x faster and gain jump boost
power.added_origins.zythl/zythlheal.name: Molten Mending
power.added_origins.zythl/zythlheal.desc: You can frequently repair your body whenever you want.
power.added_origins.zythl/zythlpower.des: You have the ability to launch yourself anywhere
power.added_origins.zythl/lavareplacemen: You are able to walk on Lava at will, furthermore, you also do not take fall damage while near lava or on fire.
added_origins.zlr_badgelavawalk: §4§l> Lava walking: §r§4Only works on source lava blocks
added_origins.zlr_badgefallimmune: §4§l> Fall Immunity: §r§4Only possible when on fire, submerged in lava, or within 2 blocks of lava
power.added_origins.zythl/lavaaura.name: Soul Presence
power.added_origins.zythl/lavaaura.descr: You naturally attract lost souls which cause them to constantly surround you.
power.added_origins.okcombat.name: Untrained
power.added_origins.okcombat.description: Dakor Warriors are less trained in combat than their Lakor counterparts.
power.added_origins.phasingii.name: Better Phasing
power.added_origins.phasingii.descriptio: You can phase through even more blocks!
power.added_origins.poisonimmune.name: Magic Immunity
power.added_origins.poisonimmune.descrip: You are immune to magic damage.
power.added_origins.poisonimmuneagain.de: Wither damage does not affect you.
power.added_origins.projarrsiashsho.name: Flame Breath
power.added_origins.projarrsiashsho.desc: You can shoot fire using your Secondary Ability key.
power.added_origins.projectilehurts.name: Easy Target
power.added_origins.projectilehurts.desc: You take twice the amount of damage from projectiles.
power.added_origins.pumpkinfire.name: Scared of the Sun
power.added_origins.ragemod.name: Rage Mode
power.added_origins.ragemod.description: Your attack damage increases significantly by pressing your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.rainydays.name: Make it Rain
power.added_origins.rainydays.descriptio: With your Secondary Ability key, you can make it rain.
power.added_origins.roach_sized.name: Roach Sized
power.added_origins.roach_sized.descript: You are the size of a roach.
power.added_origins.rooted.name: Rooting
power.added_origins.rooted.description: You are able to trap creatures in a radial vicinity while healing using your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.silverfish_sized.des: You are the size of a silverfish.
power.added_origins.silverfishiash_sized: You are the size of a silverfish.
power.added_origins.slowaat.name: Heavy Footed
power.added_origins.slowblind.name: Mole Eyes
power.added_origins.slowblind.descriptio: The sun blinds your sensitive subterranean eyes.
power.added_origins.slowblind2.name: Mole Eyes
power.added_origins.slowblind2.descripti: The sun blinds your sensitive subterranean eyes.
power.added_origins.xestrial/speedaat.de: Your body uses energy from the Arctic in order to quicken itself.
power.added_origins.xestrial/snowaura.de: You are always surrounded by snow
power.added_origins.xestrial/freezeimmun: You cannot freeze, nor do you sink in snow.
added_origins.xfi_freezeimmunity: §b§l> Freeze Immunity: §r§bYou cannot take direct damage from freezing
added_origins.xfi_powderimmunity: §b§l> Powder Walking: §r§bYou can stand perfectly on powder snow without the use of leather boots
added_origins.xfi_powdermovement: §b§l> Powder Movement: §r§bYou can traverse through powder snow without slowness at all, you can climb it and descend into it easily.
power.added_origins.xestrial/resistancei: Fire Resistance doesn't affect you, leaving you vulnerable to heat
power.added_origins.xestrial/waterreplac: You are just cold enough to be able to freeze water located directly under your feet.
power.added_origins.spookyenvironment.de: You can summon pumpkin mobs to fight for you using your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.giant/super_hydropho: You are extremely slow in water.
Food that you eat doesn't benefit you much anymore.
power.added_origins.thornsc.name: Thorns
power.added_origins.thornsc.description: Your thorns redirect damage from your attackers.
power.added_origins.triplemobdamage.name: Mob Incinerator
power.added_origins.triplemobdamage.desc: You deal 3 times additional damage to mobs.
power.added_origins.triplepillagerdamage: You deal 5 times additional damage to Illagers.
power.added_origins.triplespiderdamage.d: You deal 3 times additional damage to arthropods.
power.added_origins.villagerhater.name: Villager Raiders
power.added_origins.villagerhater.descri: You Raid the village so much that everyone there hates you...
power.added_origins.water_breath.name: Roach Lungs
power.added_origins.water_breath.descrip: You can breathe underwater for a short period of time.
power.added_origins.waterbreathall.name: Amphibious
power.added_origins.waterbreathall.descr: You can breathe on land and while submerged.
power.added_origins.weakhealrange.name: Ranged Heal
power.added_origins.weakhealrange.descri: You can heal a group of entities by pressing your Primary Ability key.
power.added_origins.xestrial/xestriallau: You have the ability to launch yourself anywhere
power.added_origins.forestspawn.name: Natural Habitat
power.added_origins.forestspawn.descript: The Darkest Forests call your name.
